text: Mental attitude and concentration are the keys to pitching.
author: Ferguson Jenkins

text: My first feeling about the paper and the attitude is that it is absurd.
author: Arthur Holly Compton

text: A discipline I have observed is an attitude of love and reverence to people.
author: Bessie Head

text: The attitude of the actor is his interpretation of what he reads, and the written word is what creates the role in the actor's mind, and I guess in reading the things that were given to me, I reacted as you guys saw me, you know.
author: Gene Barry

text: I can't believe the pro-choicers attitude toward unborn children-to me it's the ultimate liberal cause, to defend those without a voice.
author: Michael Aston
